title: Linux下开服的sh文件,要写什么内容才能实现崩服重启!
author: duibuqi_
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: SpaceBang
replies.txt_content:
:start
java.exe -server -Xincgc -Xmx16G -jar mc.jar
goto start复制代码

错误报告内包含了一份坐标
疑似玩家或者服务器原因导致的崩溃
Player Count: 3 / 40; [EntityPlayer['Real_Carbon6116'/46866, l='sc', x=-292.36, y=65.89, z=3172.75](Real_Carbon6116 at -292.3608030357791,65.88869998537898,3172.754015033695), EntityPlayer['fengling'/42427, l='sc', x=-8397.01, y=72.00, z=2024.22](fengling at -8397.01,72.0,2024.22), EntityPlayer['Xiao_Da'/51653, l='sc', x=-280.91, y=65.00, z=3169.62](Xiao_Da at -280.91248626328604,65.0,3169.6194260663556)]
        Is Modded: Definitely; Server brand changed to 'Paper'
        Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)复制代码

嗯
